system.description:
A luxurious robe adorned with dozens of eye motifs. Donning the robe grants the following magical visual powers:

  • Surprise: The robe’s visual powers prevent the character from being surprised.

  • Infravision: To 120’.

  • Multi-directional sight: The character can see in all directions at once.

  • See invisible: Within 120’.

  • See displacement: The character sees creatures using displacement effects (e.g. a @UUID[Item.AQaNag8DolMwL3Dv]{displacer cloak}) in their true location.

  • Detect camouflage and hiding: The character can plainly see anyone hiding or using camouflage.

  • Targeting with light: A @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.7Ip7EsMgUOap4YFs]{light} spell cast directly on the robe causes the character to be blinded for [[/r 1d3]] rounds. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.kpC4u6vrjJ1RnikN]{Continual light} causes blindness for [[/r 2d4]] rounds.
